description:
Modern and Stylish 1 bedroom apartment 1 block from Central Park and the 110 2/3 train station! Only 11 mins from Times Square on the 2/3 train and next to great restaurants like Seasoned Vegan, Cantina 1838, Silver Moon Bakery and many more! You’ll love my place because of the great natural lighting, large & modern kitchen and amazing bathroom! Secure (intercom and FOB key system) and comfortable (we actually live here). My place is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Great natural light, 5 floors up but we have an elevator (bonus in NYC!), large kitchen with plenty of counter space for cooking, 6 person dining table and more than enough space to make you feel at home!

You will have access to the entire apartment!

1 minute walk to the 2/3 110 Central Park Station! You can get to Times Square in 11 mins! Grocery store right across the street and theres also 2 Chinese Restaurants and a Subway across the road too!
name: Modern Apt in Harlem steps from Central Park!
review: Great location, host was a great communicator and was very thoughtful. Apartment was exactly as described - clean, centrally located, well-equipped. Highly recommend!!
